Module kivakit.kernel

Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.vm

package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.vm
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Console
     
    JavaVirtualMachine
    An object for working with a Java virtual machine, including getting properties, instrumentation and determining the rough size of objects.
    JavaVirtualMachineHealth
     
    KivaKitShutdownHook
    Adds order-of-execution to Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread).
    OperatingSystem
    An abstraction of features of the underlying OS through Java interfaces.
    Processes
    Utility methods that work with Java Process objects.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum
    Description
    Console.OutputType
     
    KivaKitShutdownHook.Order
    The order that a hook should be run in, either among the set of first hooks, or among the set of last hooks.
  • Annotation Types Summary
    Annotation Type
    Description
    JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitExcludeFromSizeOf
    Exclude a field or class from sizeOfObjectGraph() calculations
    JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitExcludeFromSizeOfDebugTracing
    Exclude a field or class from sizeOfObjectGraph() debug tracing
    JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitNonCyclicObjectGraph
    To mark objects passed to sizeOfObjectGraph() as not having cycles (for efficiency).
